message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm asking for $22,000.  I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I'm really interested in the product, but $22,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $22,000 is a fair reflection of its worth, I understand your budget concerns.  How about we meet closer to the middle at $18,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $18,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $14,000. Can you consider that?
